styles p: yes pay full attention this is for gangstas this is for gentlemen theres two kind of people out there i happen to be the boss type im a product of my environment blame the streets i am what they made me

i said gangstas ride ride with me gentlemen live your life live it up cause gangstas die we all gon die its only a matter of time the clock tickin
